name: MTLIntersectionFunctionSignature
desc: Constants for specifying different types of custom intersection functions.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Returns a new signature description from a specified raw value.

items.name: static var instancing: MTLIntersectionFunctionSignature
items.desc: A flag indicating that function signature uses instancing.

items.name: static var triangleData: MTLIntersectionFunctionSignature
items.desc: A flag indicating that function signature uses triangle data.

items.name: static var worldSpaceData: MTLIntersectionFunctionSignature
items.desc: A flag indicating that function signature uses world space data.
